title: Special Duration Up
paragraphs: Special Duration Up is an ability in Splatoon. In Splatoon 2, it was replaced by Special Power Up.
Special Duration Up improves the duration of special weapons. Forge gear has a 5Ã— chance of rolling this ability.

The effects of the Bubbler, Inkzooka, Kraken, Bomb Rush, and Echolocator all last longer. This helps the player splat, track foes, and protect themselves depending on the special that they currently have equipped. For the Inkstrike and Killer Wail, there is more time to aim and the recovery time after use is shortened. When a Bubbler is extended to teammates, they also benefit from the increased duration regardless of whether they have Special Duration Up.
Special Duration Up is the main ability of:
Increase in special duration for the Echolocator:
Increase in special duration for the Bomb Rush, Bubbler, Inkzooka, and Kraken:
Decrease in vulnerability time after using the Inkstrike:
Decrease in vulnerability time after using the Killer Wail:
- Duration of special weapons with Special Duration Up.
- Number of bombs and Inkzooka shots with Special Duration Up.
- Vulnerability time after activating the Killer Wail or Inkstrike with Special Duration Up.
- No Tentatek gear has Special Duration Up as its main ability.
